data.name: TOPIA
data.detailed_description:
It's a normal day in 2022 when suddenly you meet Rose, a highschool student from 2052 who came to explore the past leading to her present - and luckily she invites you along.

Your Choice Matters

The power is in your hands: As the story progresses, you choose how to interact with the world around you - and that makes an impact on the future.

Explore A Vibrant World

Experience various colorful locations and interact with the characters you meet along the way.

Experience Only In VR

Topia is a short and sweet VR experience.
It was created by Shilat Kikayon as a final project for Visual Communication Design studies at Holon Institute of Technology.

data.short_description: TOPIA is a time travel, choice based VR adventure game where the future is literally in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Additional Notes: Has been tested only on GTX 1080 and greater.
